description:
In the wake of the assassination attempt on Lacus, Kira and his friends realize that they have been targeted by the government of the PLANTs. Kira then receives a letter from his sister Cagalli, in which she tells him of her intention to marry Yuna and asks him to return Athrun`s ring on her behalf.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 明日への出航[たびだち]
